Class ServerLobby

    • network.ServerLobby

extends java.lang.Object

    Richard, Julien

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String playerName,
                      ServerPeer server)
               throws NameSpaceException,
                      NameUsedException
        Add a player to a lobby.
        Parameters:
        playerName, - the name of the player
        server, - it's connection peer
        Throws:
        NameSpaceException - if the name contains a space (invalid)
        NameUsedException - if the name is already existing in the server.
